name: Send Paystack invoices from new Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet rows
description: Make will watch for new rows in a specified Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet, create customers in Paystack, then create invoices and send notifications to customers. This template uses this [example worksheet](https://1drv.ms/x/s!AnDK8KmbvjyFkFc4yfJA9wSWXzmN?e=oA1SL4).
